author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Guardian Build Showcase - How I Play Guardian
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be giving you guys further tips on how to play Guardian, and I'm going to do a full run-through of the game as well. And kind of explain to you my decision-making process along the way, so that you can understand why I've made the decision about Guardian in an attempt to show you how you might make better decisions about the gear that you pick up when playing Guardian.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
